unnormalised: Reports are coming in from across the country of celebrations for Shri. Ratan Tata's 87th b'day! The business tycoon is known for his philanthropy and is widely respected by one and all. Word on the street is that he celebrated quietly with family and close friends at his residence in Mumbai.
normalised: Reports are coming in from across the country of celebrations for Shree Ratan Tata's eighty seventh birthday! The business tycoon is known for his philanthropy and is widely respected by one and all. Word on the street is that he celebrated quietly with family and close friends at his residence in Mumbai.

unnormalised: Numerous tributes have poured in online, with fans and admirers using the hashtag #RatanTataBday to express their good wishes. From students to CEOs, everyone seems to adore the former Chairman of Tata Sons. His initiatives in education and healthcare have made him a real-life hero to so many, especially in rural India.
normalised: Numerous tributes have poured in online, with fans and admirers using the hash Ratan Tata Birthday to express their good wishes. From students to C-E-Os, everyone seems to adore the former Chairman of Tata Sons. His initiatives in education and healthcare have made him a real-life hero to so many, especially in rural India.

unnormalised: Smt. Nirmala Sitharaman, the Finance Minister, tweeted earlier today, saying, "Wishing Shri. Ratan Tata a long and healthy life. His contributions to the Indian economy and society are immeasurable." Many other prominent personalities have also acknowledged his birthday through various social media posts.

His contributions to the Indian economy and society are immeasurable." Many other prominent personalities have also acknowledged his birthday through various social media posts.

unnormalised: Even celebrities like Mr. Amitabh Bachchan and Ms. Priyanka Chopra have shared their well wishes. Clearly, he's an icon to more than just the business world! Reports confirm that various charitable organizations and NGOs have also conducted various social service campaigns today, on the auspicious occasion of his birthday, as a mark of their respect.

unnormalised: Wishing Shri. Ratan Tata a very happy birthday! May he continue to inspire generations to come. We hope he is enjoying some much deserved rest, and of course some delicious b'day cake!
